_header: For God is lord of all thing / As prophets tellen I-mene
Note: Latin, French and English versions of each distich following one another.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ffor god is lord of alle þingAs prophetes tellen i
                    meneþou schalt him in werk honoureAnd wiþ þi
                    þouȝtes clene…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Alle þat reden and wolle recordenþis smale
                    techinges bi deneGod hem graunte þorw his graceOf heore sunnes be
                    clene Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
Interspersed with Latin and French verse; written in
                    half-lines.
